wikipedia_page.main:
Stuart Godfrey Popham,  (born July 1954) is a British lawyer.
A former senior partner at Clifford Chance, he is the vice chairman of EMEA Banking at Citigroup. He is a Queen's Counsel and the former chairman of Chatham House.
